edu.wpi.first.wpilibj
Class ADXL345DigitalAccelerometer

java.lang.Object
  edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SensorBase
      edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.ADXL345DigitalAccelerometer

public class ADXL345DigitalAccelerometer
extends SensorBase

digital accelerometer from the 2010 KOP this implementation just gets the 3 axis values and allows setting the range Possible enhancements: Add access to other features of the chip Add measurement of error during intialization and set channel offsets
